original_text:
and all the people will know,
    Ephraim and the inhabitants of Samaria,
    who say in pride and in arrogance of heart:
korean_text: 모든 백성 곧 에브라임과 사마리아 주민이 알 것이어늘 그들이 교만하고 완악한 마음으로 말하기를

sentences.original_text: and all the people will know
Ephraim and the inhabitants of Samaria
who say in pride and in arrogance of heart:
